content: until you have 7 stitches left cast on 2 new stitches knit 2 cast on 2 more stitches knit one knit 5 more row place the tie through the holes and hold it in place when you start casting off so you don t have to arrange it later continue by folding your work to the inside and pick up the same stitch you originally picked up from knit those 2 stitches together pick up another original stitch and knit it together with the one on the needles lift the first stitch you knit together over the one you just made continue with knitting one stitch together with the original pickup stitch and lifting another one over it make sure you pick up the correct stitch that is directly under the one on the needle finishing weave in all the ends and block your balaclava soak it in lukewarm water with a bit of detergent rinse it a couple of times and lay flat to dry make sure you don t stretch it too much
